description: Enterprise techniques used by Skeleton Key, ATT&CK software S0007 (v1.2)
name: Skeleton Key (S0007)

techniques.comment: [Skeleton Key](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0007) is used to patch an enterprise domain controller authentication process with a backdoor password. It allows adversaries to bypass the standard authentication system to use a defined password for all accounts authenticating to that domain controller.(Citation: Dell Skeleton)
